subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the TreeView UI component.

subMembers.name: animationEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to animate item collapsing and expanding.

subMembers.name: collapseIcon
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom collapse icon.

subMembers.name: createChildren
subMembers.description: Allows you to load nodes on demand.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxTreeViewItem> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: dataStructure
subMembers.description: Notifies the UI component of the data structure in use.

subMembers.name: expandAllEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not a user can expand all tree view items by the "*" hot key.

subMembers.name: expandEvent
subMembers.description: Specifies the event on which to expand/collapse a node.

subMembers.name: expandIcon
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom expand icon.

subMembers.name: expandNodesRecursive
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not all parent nodes of an initially expanded node are displayed expanded.

subMembers.name: expandedExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field specifies whether an item is expanded.

subMembers.name: hasItemsExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding [node] includes child nodes.

subMembers.name: itemsExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field contains nested items. Applies only if the [dataStructure] property is *"tree"*.

subMembers.name: parentIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field for holding the parent key of the corresponding [node].

subMembers.name: rootValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the [parent ID] value of the root item.

subMembers.name: scrollDirection
subMembers.description: A string value specifying available scrolling directions.

subMembers.name: selectAllText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed at the "Select All" check box.

subMembers.name: selectByClick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether an item is selected if a user clicks it.

subMembers.name: selectNodesRecursive
subMembers.description: Specifies whether all child nodes should be selected when their parent node is selected. Applies only if the [selectionMode] is *"multiple"*.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies item selection mode. Applies only if selection is enabled.

subMembers.name: showCheckBoxesMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the checkbox display mode.

subMembers.name: useNativeScrolling
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: virtualModeEnabled
subMembers.description: Enables the virtual mode in which nodes are loaded on demand. Use it to enhance the performance on large datasets.

subMembers.name: Node
subMembers.description: A TreeView node.

subMembers.name: children
subMembers.description: Contains all the child nodes of the current node.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Equals to **true** if the node is disabled; otherwise **false**.

subMembers.name: expanded
subMembers.description: Equals **true** if the node is expanded; **false** if collapsed.

subMembers.name: itemData
subMembers.description: Contains the data source object corresponding to the node.

subMembers.name: key
subMembers.description: Contains the key value of the node.

subMembers.name: parent
subMembers.description: Refers to the parent node of the current node.

subMembers.name: selected
subMembers.description: Equals to **true** if the node is selected; **false** if not.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Contains the text displayed by the node.

properties.name: dxTreeView
properties.description: The TreeView UI component is a tree-like representation of textual data.

Methods.name: collapseAll()
Methods.description: Collapses all items.

Methods.name: collapseItem(itemData)
Methods.description: Collapses an item with a specific key.

Methods.name: collapseItem(itemElement)
Methods.description: Collapses an item found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: collapseItem(key)
Methods.description: Collapses an item with a specific key.

Methods.name: expandAll()
Methods.description: Expands all items. If you [load items on demand], this method expands only the loaded items.

Methods.name: expandItem(itemData)
Methods.description: Expands an item found using its data object.

Methods.name: expandItem(itemElement)
Methods.description: Expands an item found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: expandItem(key)
Methods.description: Expands an item with a specific key.

Methods.name: getNodes()
Methods.description: Gets all nodes.

Methods.name: getScrollable()
Methods.description: Gets the instance of the UI component's scrollable part.

Methods.name: getSelectedNodeKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the keys of selected nodes.

Methods.name: getSelectedNodes()
Methods.description: Gets selected nodes.

Methods.name: scrollToItem(itemData)
Methods.description: Scrolls the content to an item found using its data.

Methods.name: scrollToItem(itemElement)
Methods.description: Scrolls the content to an item found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: scrollToItem(key)
Methods.description: Scrolls the content to an item found using its key.

Methods.name: selectAll()
Methods.description: Selects all nodes.

Methods.name: selectItem(itemData)
Methods.description: Selects a node found using its data object.

Methods.name: selectItem(itemElement)
Methods.description: Selects a TreeView node found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: selectItem(key)
Methods.description: Selects a node with a specific key.

Methods.name: unselectAll()
Methods.description: Cancels the selection of all nodes.

Methods.name: unselectItem(itemData)
Methods.description: Cancels the selection of a node found using its data object.

Methods.name: unselectItem(itemElement)
Methods.description: Cancels the selection of a TreeView node found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: unselectItem(key)
Methods.description: Cancels the selection of a node with a specific key.

Methods.name: updateDimensions()
Methods.description: Updates the tree view scrollbars according to the current size of the UI component content.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemCollapsed
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tree view item is collapsed.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemExpanded
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tree view item is expanded.

Events.name: onItemHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onItemSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a single TreeView item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectAllValueChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when the "Select All" check box value is changed. Applies only if [showCheckBoxesMode] is *"selectAll"* and [selectionMode] is *"multiple"*.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a TreeView item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: itemCollapsed
Events.description: Raised when a tree view item is collapsed.

Events.name: itemExpanded
Events.description: Raised when a tree view item is expanded.

Events.name: itemSelectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a tree view item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: selectAllValueChanged
Events.description: Raised when the "Select All" check box value is changed.

Events.name: selectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a tree view item is selected or selection is canceled.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemCollapsedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemCollapsed] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemExpandedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemExpanded] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemHoldEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemHold] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemSelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemSelectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: SelectAllValueChangedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [selectAllValueChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TreeViewExpandEvent
Types.description: Specifies the event on which to expand/collapse a node.
